official.headline: Order Restored
official.anchor_line: Directorate patrols and electronic passes now ensure secure movement across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: With the temporary restoration of the Behavioral Compliance Index, daily life remains orderly while vital services continue for compliant citizens.

official.headline: Smart Rationing Begins
official.anchor_line: Ration lines and digital kiosks help distribute essentials, guided by BCI scores.
official.contextual_reframing: This efficient system prioritizes residents whose behavior best aligns with civic values, delivering fairness through verified electronic access.

official.headline: Curfew Supporting Safety
official.anchor_line: Curfews are now in effect, maintaining calm and predictability throughout the city.
official.contextual_reframing: Citywide guidance ensures every resident can confidently work, travel, and thrive as systems respond to changing needs.

underground.headline: Locked Out Again
underground.anchor_line: Directorate troops are back, gating movement with digital passes and surprise checks.
underground.contextual_reframing: The BCI—Behavioral Compliance Index—decides if you eat, move, or even get seen. Fail their score, you get delays, denials, or just disappear.

underground.headline: Ration Chaos Returns
underground.anchor_line: Ration lines spread as the system sorts citizens like packages—no questions, no choice.
underground.contextual_reframing: How you queue, what you get, and if you get it at all depends on your BCI score. 'Compliant'? You get more. Flagged? Hope you like uncertainty.

underground.headline: Curfew. Again.
underground.anchor_line: Night falls early now as curfews, checkpoints, and sudden patrols tighten the leash.
underground.contextual_reframing: It’s all back—surveillance, forced routines, and the message: behave, or be erased. They call this security. You call it survival.
